column5: My place is a new house build in 2015 and is close to all major highways ( PGBT, 121, DNT, 635), Restaurants, shopping, entertainment. This home is perfect for an extended stay with three comfortable bedrooms, a office space, wifi, and plenty of empty closets for storing luggage, clothing, etc. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.  As a welcome gesture, I stock up the fridge with Milk, Bread and Eggs on the day of the check in.
column8: Home Away from Home - Perfect Location
